MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS errorLogs (t1 string, t2 string, t3 string, t4 string, t5 string, t6 string, t7 string) STORED AS ORC; INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE errorLogs SELECT t1, t2, t3, t4, t5, t6, t7 FROM log4jLogs WHERE t4 = '[ERROR]';

2012-02-03 18:35:34 SampleClass0 [ERROR] incorrect id 2012-02-03 18:55:54 SampleClass1 [ERROR] incorrect id 2012-02-03 19:25:27 SampleClass4 [ERROR] incorrect id Time taken: 0.987 seconds, Fetched: 3 row(s)
